trans-unit.source: Enables the use of standard commands to control the editing of property values.
Gets the command that the editor raises to abort an attempt to update a property value.
If this command is executed when there are not any open transactions, an exception is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that aborts a transaction.
Gets the command that the editor raises to begin an attempt to update a property value.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that begins a transaction.
Gets the command that the editor raises to commit an update of a property value.
If this command is executed when there are not any open transactions, an exception is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that commits a transaction.
Gets the command that the editor raises to indicate to the host that the updating of a property value is complete.
This enables the host to do cleanup or potentially change the focus to a different <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that indicates that the updating of a value is complete.

Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref> to <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.Dialog"></xref> editing mode.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that switches the edit mode.

Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref> to <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.ExtendedPinned"></xref> editing mode.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that switches the edit mode.

Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref> to <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.ExtendedPopup"></xref> editing mode.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that switches the edit mode.

Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref> to <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.Inline"></xref> editing mode.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> that switches the edit mode.
